summary: This mod let's you loot the armor from General Falx in Fort Frostmoth in and makes it better. This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#3d85c6][size=5]Introduction[/size][/color]
[size=3]This mod let's you loot the armor from General Falx's corpse after you kill him.
Although the set can be enchanted, it cannot be improved so it has very good stats !!![/size]
[size=5]
[color=#3d85c6]About the mod[/color][/size][color=#f4f4f4]
[size=3]-General Falx Carius' armor is lootable
-Adds the heavy armor option and the light armor option
-Champion's Cudgel does more damage
[/size][/color][size=3]-The heavy armor set has a total of 280 defense
-The light armor set has a total of 200 defense[/size]

[color=#3d85c6][size=5]Required[/size][/color]
[size=3]-This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC
[/size]
[color=#3d85c6][size=5]Bugs[/size]
[/color][size=3]-When you take the armor the Heart Stone remains on Falx's naked corpse and when you put the armor on it doesn't appear. I will try to fix this problem soon.[/size]
[/font][size=4]
Check out my other Mod - Fort Frostmoth Reborn : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72418/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D72418%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Fort Frostmoth Reborn[/url][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#674ea7]

[/color][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#674ea7][size=5]                     [/size][/color][/b][/font][b][color=#674ea7][size=6]d-_-b   by  Trifxn   d-_-b[/size][/color][/b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#9900ff][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font]
author: Trifxn
